full_text:
It's week 7 of the #NFL season, so let's check in on my model's latest forecast

Following the @Steelers surprising win over @Buccaneers, my model adjusted Pittsburgh up and out of the lead position for the number 1 pick.  I guess that's good? #nflverse #RStats https://t.co/2RBgdVK3Tm

From a strength perspective, @BuffaloBills are creating separation from the rest of the league, which is even more impressive when you remember that my model doesn't consider wins and losses in its strength algorithm.  The @Eagles climb back on top in the NFC #nflverse https://t.co/YWW3S8scSb

That's it for our tangent - onto the weekly predictions. Biggest surprise of the week?  @49ers over the @Chiefs at home by 1.  I probably wouldn't bet on it...

As always, I welcome questions and comments
 #nflverse #RStats https://t.co/Wmu1SzH0eX

𝗗𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗮𝗽 from #thursdaynightfootball.

This viz is still a work in progress, but thought I'd share an update following some additions.

Was intrigued with the Eckel discussion online recently, so have attempted to add some of this data in the viz.

#nflverse https://t.co/jde7nsYI16

Inpredict is a valuable resource for determining market signal, but it should not be the exclusive source. Courtesy of @deepvaluebettor's elite dataviz, here is a more holistic view, through 6 weeks, of where the broader market stands on each team. 
#nflverse https://t.co/LPH6Z7NzYg

Updated Drive Quality on scripted plays vs non scripted through week 6. Can't make up this SF,LAR, GB cluster. 
#nflverse https://t.co/ReQ56TPEZ5

Pass Rush Preview, KC @ SF edition. Offenses vs the blitz. Chiefs still being blitzed less often than average, and finding success vs them. SF has had incredible success vs the blitz on first downs. 11 personnel is both teams money formation against the blitz.

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/oxyVVnge9i

Here's the defenses. Chiefs are solid but not spectacular when blitzing. They should...uhhh...maybe not blitz on second downs? Niners are solid across the board, and blitz just under average amount of times. Also, the niners basically only run two defenses?? 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/CpdbmseBdX
